g_coupon.sys.core.facade

Class CustomerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • g_coupon.sys.core.facade.CustomerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    public class CustomerFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    FACADE - class implements business logic CustomerFACADE class will contain not just the action needed to perform(DAO and DAODB) but also the testing needed to validate the action matches the business logic. Example: purchaseCoupon method would contain first a check if such Coupon exist and also check if exist by Name per Customer in the DB only then would purchase Coupon (add reference to the customer_coupon table in the DB). Admin role - in charge of create / update / remove /get one/ get all new Companies or new Customers.
    Since:
    2018-09-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Assaf Ben David

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomerFacade()
      CustomerFacade Constructor initialing the CompanyDaoDB, CustomerDaoDB ,CouponDaoDB classes, to use it later on in the Facade logic.

      getAllPurchasedCouponsByType method return all Purchased Coupons by Type (ENUM couponType) per Customer.
      void purchaseCoupon(Customer customer, Coupon coupon)
      purchaseCoupon method check if Coupon exist in DB by Name, and the Customer didn't Purchased it, and the Coupon is not expired,then the Coupon is purchased.
